definition: to break/to sever/to turn off (electric switch)
to break/to snap/to cut off/to give up or abstain from sth/to judge/(usu. used in the negative) absolutely/definitely/decidedly

to open/to start/to turn on/to boil/to write out (a prescription, check, invoice etc)/to operate (a vehicle)/carat (gold)/abbr. for Kelvin, 開爾文|开尔文[Kai1 er3 wen2]/abbr. for 開本|开本[kai1 ben3], book format

sentences.english: The connection could not be disconnected because it was created by the multi-protocol router.
sentences.chinese: 通訊不能被斷開，因爲該通訊被多協議路由器完成。

sentences.english: “Well, what is disconnection?” Roberts said again.
sentences.chinese: “好吧，‘斷開’到底是什麼？”羅伯茨再次追問。

sentences.english: You can force some or all connections off from a database.
sentences.chinese: 可以迫使某些或所有應用程序斷開與數據庫的連接。

sentences.english: Disconnect the Internet and power off your cell phone if you have to.
sentences.chinese: 如果必要的話斷開你的網絡並關閉手機。

sentences.english: This includes planned disconnection as well as abrupt disconnection from the local network.
sentences.chinese: 包括計劃好的斷開以及本地網絡的突發斷開。

sentences.english: This includes planned disconnection as well as abrupt disconnection from the local network.
sentences.chinese: 包括計劃好的斷開以及本地網絡的突發斷開。

sentences.english: Cracks in material were simulated through breaking beam elements.
sentences.chinese: 材料內部裂紋通過斷開梁單元來模擬。

sentences.english: Whether NetworkManager should be connected and disconnected on sleep.
sentences.chinese: 睡眠時網絡管理器是否應當連接或斷開連接。

sentences.english: Usually, the graph contains several Data Objects in a hierarchical tree structure. The client works with the graph using a disconnected programming model.
sentences.chinese: 此客戶機使用斷開連接的編程模型來處理數據圖。

sentences.english: Finally, the strokes, which left by erasing grid-line, are reconstructed.
sentences.chinese: 最後再對因格線刪除而斷開的筆畫進行重構。

sentences.english: Right-click to open and close the circuit.
Each surge at power-on contributed to small changes that eventually caused the fuse to open.
sentences.chinese: 上電的每個浪湧貢獻了小改變，最終導致保險絲斷開。

sentences.english: Right-click to open or close on rising temperature.
sentences.chinese: 溫度升高時，右擊斷開或接通電路。

definition: to avoid the important and dwell on the trivial/to keep silent about major charges while admitting minor ones
to confuse one thing with another (idiom); to muddle
lit. change to more severe (idiom); to become more intense (esp. of shortcoming)/to aggravate/to intensify
to cut off/to chop sth in half
to sway/to waver/to rock/to rattle/to destabilize/to pose a challenge to
